title: Watermelon Ice Nicotine Pouches By 77
description: TRY 77 WATERMELON ICE NICOTINE POUCHES Watermelon Ice nicotine pouches by 77 combine the sweet, juicy flavour of watermelon with a burst of chilly freshness. The chilly undertones produce a crisp and cool experience, leaving you feeling refreshed, while the bright watermelon flavour gives a fruity, summery sweetness. View all 77 Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Mint/Menthol Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: 20MG Per Gram | 10MG Per Pouch Watermelon-flavoured nicotine pouches Recommended for experienced users Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 20 pouches in each can MORE ABOUT WATERMELON ICE FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES Juicy, sun-ripened watermelon flavour is combined with a chilly, icy twist in this wonderful and refreshing flavour combination known as "Watermelon Ice." Each pouch will transport you back to carefree days of summer with its authentic flavour of fresh watermelon. If you prefer the combination of fruity sweetness and a crisp, cold sensation, you'll love this since the menthol-like ice ingredient offers a calming and stimulating depth. Watermelon Ice is a flavour that gives a new and pleasurable experience, guaranteeing that your nicotine pouch trip is both tasty and revitalising. MORE ABOUT 77 NICOTINE POUCHES 77 were the first polish brand of tobacco-free nicotine pouches. 77 offers one of the most diverse ranges of flavour on the market, 77 also hit the sweet spot with their nicotine levels. Switch up, switch down, mix and match â€“ do whatever suits you best! Flavours range from different types of mint to peach, apple, strawberries, and even classic tobacco.
